Jotunn smiled: I am glad I have your support. Grimlock, there'll be
plenty =
of metal for you to much, and Elder, I will make sure no one
undeserving le=
aves with the Matrix. Now get ready, we're here soon.

He turned to the cre=
w.

Trooper: Commander, we're entering flier range now. Artillery range in
=
1 cycle.

Jotunn: Allright! Fliers, you are good to go!

A swarm of about 1=
0 fliers left the transport ships and headed for the
battlefield They all h=
ad special weaponry equipped: special bullets
that would get lodged into th=
eir enemies and that would designate them
for artillery fire. They were rea=
dy to engage the enemy.

Jotunn: Communications, advise the defenders that =
we're coming in as
reinforcements. Tell them to make sure they revert to me=
dium- or
long-range attacks. It's their priority to disengage melee attack.=


Comms sent the message.
